#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
    
    int i,j,k,cases,n;
    cin>>n;
    long long int arr[n+1],sum;
    for(k=1;k<=n;k++)
    {
        cin>>arr[k];
    }
    
    for(k=2;k<=n;k++)
    {
     arr[k]=arr[k-1]+arr[k];   
    }
    cin>>cases;
    arr[0]=0;
    for(k=1;k<=cases;k++)
    {  
        cin>>i>>j;
        sum=arr[j]-arr[i-1];
        cout<<endl<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
